roleset.name: provide with equipment
roleset.note: EQUIP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'equip' based on sentences in wsj and automatiexpansion via verbnet. (from equip.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: It also issued a final rule requiring auto makers to equip light trucks and minivans with lap-shoulder belts for rear seats beginning in the 1992 model year.
example.arg: with lap-shoulder belts for rear seats

example.name: passive
example.text: In September, the department had said it will require [trucks and minivans]-1 to be equipped *trace*-1 with the same front-seat headrests that have long been required on passenger cars.
example.arg: with the same front-seat headrests that have long been required on passenger cars

example.name: adjectival
example.text: But Humana says its own facilities could serve its insured for less if they were properly equipped.
